params._deltaLiquidityAmount: difference of liquidity If LPs want LP token price of deposit, _deltaLiquidityAmount is positive number of amount to deposit. On the other hand, if LPs want LP token price of withdrawal, _deltaLiquidityAmount is negative number of amount to withdraw.

returns._0: Amount of USDC and underlying reqired for hedging

params._tradeAmounts: amount of position to trade. positive to get long price and negative to get short price.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._feeRecepient: The address of new fee recepient

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

deposit(uint256).notice: Provides liquidity to the pool and mints LP tokens

getMinCollateralToAddPosition(uint256,in.notice: Gets value of min collateral to add positions

getPositionValueAndMinCollateral(uint256.notice: Gets position value and min collateral

getVaultStatus(uint256).notice: Gets position value of a vault

liquidateByPool(uint256).notice: Liquidates a vault by Pool Anyone can liquidate a vault whose PositionValue is less than MinCollateral. The caller gets a portion of the margin as reward.

setMaxAmount(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets max amounts that a vault can hold

trade((uint256,(uint256,uint256,int128,u.notice: Opens new positions or closes hold position of the perpetual contracts and manage margin in the vault at the same time.

withdraw(uint128).notice: Withdraws liquidity from the pool and burn LP tokens

userdoc.notice: Perpetual Market Contract is entry point of traders and liquidity providers. It manages traders' vault storage and holds funds from traders and liquidity providers. Error Codes PM0: tx exceed deadline PM1: limit price PM2: caller is not vault owner PM3: vault not found PM4: caller is not hedger PM5: vault limit PM6: Paused PM7: Not paused
